description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Combat 9 evil wizard monkeys and various fluffy creatures. Steal a wizard hat and use its 4 different spells to complete the many different levels. Play alone or cooperatively with your friends (up to 4 players). Includes a deathmatch and survival game mode.
description.short: Combat 9 evil wizard monkeys and various fluffy creatures. Steal a wizard hat and use its 4 different spells to complete the many different levels. Play alone or cooperatively with your friends (up to 4 players). Includes a deathmatch and survival game mode.
